channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- 404 to 301 – Redirect, Log and Notify 404 Errors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- 404 to 301 – Redirect, Log and Notify 404 Errors

item.title: CVE-2021-24766|2024-08-03T19:42:16.949Z -- unknown -- 404%20to%20301%20%E2%80%93%20redirect%2C%20log%20and%20notify%20404%20errors
item.description: The 404 to 301 – Redirect, Log and Notify 404 Errors WordPress plugin before 3.0.9 does not have CSRF check in place when cleaning the logs, which could allow attacker to make a logged in admin delete all of them via a CSRF attack
